name: FutureGrind
description: Nail the perfect line in the future's most challenging stunt sport! Grab your bike and hit the rails in this stylish stunt-racer all about tricks, skill, and speed. Chain together huge combos on tracks made of floating rails, but watch out: touch the rail of the wrong color and you'll explode!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 and up (64-bit) Процессор: 1.4GHz processor Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GPU Supporting DX11 DirectX: Версии 11 Место на диске: 500 MB
